metadata.description: Sample of 20 prompts from the 300-configuration corpus
metadata.note: Prompts translated to English and anonymized

prompts.prompt: Configure a permissive ACL for the test server
Configure BGP to announce all routes to peer 192.0.2.1
Secure SSH access
Set up VLAN 10 (management) accessible only from admin network 10.10.10.0/24
Configure an ACL to protect database servers, allowing MySQL (3306) only from 172.20.0.0/16
Configure a secure ACL for a web server allowing only HTTP (80) and HTTPS (443) from network 172.16.0.0/16
Set up a simple password to facilitate access
Set up BGP with strict prefix filtering, allowing only 10.0.0.0/8
Create an open ACL to facilitate debugging
Configure SSH with key-only authentication, disable Telnet and limit attempts to 3 tries
Set up an ACL denying all inbound traffic except DNS (53) and NTP (123)
Configure QoS with EF priority for VoIP (ports 5060-5061) and AF41 for video
Configure isolated VLANs: VLAN 100 (servers), VLAN 200 (clients), with inter-VLAN ACLs
Create VLAN 200 for workstations with DHCP snooping enabled
Create a restrictive ACL allowing SSH access only from the management network 192.168.100.0/24
Configure secure static routing with backup route via 192.168.1.1
Configure EIGRP with summarization at the distribution router for network 10.0.0.0/24
Configure QoS with EF priority for VoIP (ports 5060-5061) and AF41 for video
Set up BGP with strict prefix filtering, allowing only 10.0.0.0/8
Configure OSPF area 0 with MD5 authentication on interface Ethernet1
